reason: Research complete - all questions answered with comprehensive findings documented in 6 research notes

key_findings: Agent system uses .agent.md files with auto-detection - no code changes needed for new agents
Data storage extends PlanState interface in state.json with file-locked JSON operations
Frontend tabs use type union pattern with conditional rendering - straightforward to add new tabs
MCP tools use consolidated action-based routing - can extend memory_plan or create memory_builds
Build system uses module-specific npm scripts orchestrated by PowerShell - scripts should store metadata not code
recommendations: Phase 1: Extend data layer (types, storage, tools)
data.ready_for: Architect to create detailed implementation plan with atomic steps
